tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PestInfestationData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    pest_type VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    pest_count INT,
    weather_conditions VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Pests (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
occurrence_date DATE NOT NULL,
location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE PestPredictions (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
pest_id INT NOT NULL,
prediction_date DATE NOT NULL,
prediction_result VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
FOREIGN KEY (pest_id) REFERENCES Pests(id));

CREATE TABLE occurrences (
    occurrence_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    pest_id INT,
    location_id INT,
    occurrence_date DATE,
    occurrence_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE PestOccurrences (
    pest_occurrence_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date_occurred DATE,
    pest_type VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    severity INT
);

CREATE TABLE EnvironmentConditions (
    env_condition_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date_recorded DATE,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    wind_speed FLOAT,
    rain_amount FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE PredictiveModels (
    model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(50),
    model_type VARCHAR(50),
    accuracy FLOAT,
    trained_on DATE
);

CREATE TABLE pest_occurrences (
    occurrence_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    pest_type VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    occurrence_date DATE,
    severity_level INT
)

CREATE TABLE pest_history (
    history_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    pest_type VARCHAR(50),
    first_occurrence_date DATE,
    last_occurrence_date DATE,
    total_occurrences INT
)

CREATE TABLE weather_data (
    weather_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    weather_date DATE,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE pest_predictive_models (
    model_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(50),
    description VARCHAR(255),
    accuracy_level FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE predictive_model_results (
    result_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id UUID,
    evaluation_date DATE,
    precision FLOAT,
    recall FLOAT
)
